item.title: Why Happy Happy Joy?
item.description:
Why Happy Happy Joy?

Hello and welcome!

Happy Happy Joy was born in the months following the sudden and entirely unexpected death of my darling 12 year old niece Angel. I remember all too well the relentless sadness following her passing. That feeling somehow evolved into a kind of numbness for the most part with episodes of grief that came and went without warning.

item.title: Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air
item.description:
Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air

Camden, London-based commercial still life photographer Piotr Gregorczyk likes to play with food and gravity. One concept he has focused on for a number of recent projects is the idea of showing various food dishes flying through the air as they come together on a plate or in a bowl.
